english.segment1: Left To My Ambitions I Find Myself Feeling. Short Of Breath And Losing Hope Again
english.segment2: When Will I Be Free. When Will I Feel Alive. I Am At My End And I Can't Breath
english.segment3: I Can't Breathe Everything I Do Is Useless. I Can't Do This On My Own I'm Fading. Too Many Times I've Left In Silence. This Time I Won't Give Up So Soon
english.segment4: Crying Out For Some Relief. I Keep.
